subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*bruk||piebald}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}, STEDT); cognate with {{cog|my|tr=prok|t=spotted, speckled}}, {{cog|mjw|pʰròk}}, {{cog|kac|prúʔ}}, {{cog|mro|preu||of mixed colors}}. Another Chinese cognate may be {{och-l|[[班]]}}

{{och-l|[[豹]]|[[leopard]]}} is its exopassive derivative, literally meaning, "the spotted one".
